org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.types

Interface OrderedInventory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Inventory, Iterable<Inventory>, Nameable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CraftingInventory, CustomInventory, EquipmentInventory, GridInventory, Hotbar, Inventory2D, InventoryColumn, InventoryRow

    public interface OrderedInventory
extends Inventory
    An Ordered Inventory contains Slots in some pre-determined order with indices between 0 and 1-Inventory.capacity().
